Knight-Swift, the largest full truckload carrier in the industry, released its Q1 2024 earnings report on April 24, 2024, with revenue declining 5.3% due to the acquisition of U.S. Xpress but showing growth in intermodal revenue. Analysts give KNX stock a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating, with forward-looking guidance projecting adjusted EPS ranging from $0.32 to $0.43 in Q4 2024 and Q1 2025.
introduction: Franklin Resources Inc. acquired 1.38 million shares of Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Inc. in the third quarter, valued at approximately $70 million.
